name: Student PE total balance
query:
select customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:100", customer_group, name as "Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:100", grand_total as "Grand Total", net_total as "Net Total", paid_amount as Paid, outstanding_amount as "Outstanding Amount", due_date as "Due Date:date:100", selling_price_list, status, student 
from `tabSales Invoice` 
order by student, name
